dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: You’ve decided to use me at last…! Ufu, you certainly won’t regret it.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: The morning sermons given by the One Who Grips never fail to fascinate me… Would you like to hear some, too?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Have you enjoyed your meal? Oh, me? For myself, I am fasting to attain my purest state.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Let’s see, the area to purify today is… Oh, you’re here. I’m rather busy tonight. Got some purification to do, you see, so let’s talk later. Fuhu.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: O One Who Grips… For the One Who Grips so desires it…

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Prosthetics… I dunno why anyone would slap on such things. “What should someone whose arm got lopped off do, then?” Pfh, I mean, can’t you just savor the pain of the moment? Why worry about what comes after?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: I became a Mittelhammer pretty recently. I earned it for being the most faithful among all the little Klein ones! Fuhu, I am so dang proud of myself…

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: You… Are you a heretic? That clock— Oh, just a mask? Ahaha, got it… This could’ve been a real mess. I was this close to piercing my new acquaintance with a nail.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Fuhu, kuhuhu…! With each heretic I p-pierce… I feel myself becoming more and more whole…! …Ahem. How long were you there? That wasn’t exactly appropriate behavior to show you.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: …In 3:9 it states, “The One Who Grips called their hammers…” Oh, don’t mind me. I’m just studying my doctrines.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: I swear, I swear to you! I will return this favor… Fuhu!

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: I have been waiting.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: The heretics… shall be punished by steel.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Did you call for me?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Purge!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: The heretic falters.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Such weakness!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: You will repent with your death.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: This… can’t be…

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I answered your trust. Fuhu.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: …I will study again from the beginning.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: A victory to faith.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Ahaha! W-With this, I shall be exalted to an even higher place…!

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: This… humiliation… will not be forgotten…
